data.message: J king c Wright needs to be blocked from facebook  he's insulting people using rude words and hurtful words

replies.message: Hi Barbara. If someone is being bullied or harassed on Facebook, please report it: http://bit.ly/2hnqpKM. You can also find tips and resources for helping you deal with bullying and harassment here: http://bit.ly/2ymukLq and on our Bullying Prevention Hub: http://bit.ly/2hWXavp. Please keep in mind that if you feel someone is in immediate danger, you should contact your local authorities. -Kiara
